features: There are also two wired controllers, a scratch card, and an included HDMI cable.
A perfect console for fans with a lot of taste and for a new generation wanting to experience the dawn of PlayStation for the first time. Playstation Classic design
Same famous logo, button layout and outer packaging, but this mini console is approximately 45% smaller than the original PlayStation and includes an HDMI cable to connect directly to a TV.
The USB AC adapter is not included or sold separately. You can use your own USB AC adapter for smart devices, the required specification is 5V/1.0 amp/5W or higher.
body.description: Introducing the miniature recreation of the iconic PlayStation Classic A console, pre-loaded with 20 fan-favorite games along with two wired controllers for local multiplayer programs and a virtual memory card for saving vital games. PlayStation Classic also features the same famous logo, button layout, and outer packaging, but this mini console is approximately 45% smaller than the original PlayStation and includes an HDMI cable to connect directly to a TV. PlayStation Classic is the perfect console for fans who love the air and for a new generation wanting to experience the dawn of PlayStation for the first time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and such a kickback that’s super fun
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been stuck at the house with no vehicle and money was flying out the window. This gives me something to do at times I have no work to do and helps me save money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars buying a few add ons from different companies makes the purchase worth it, if the price is right!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this and true blue mini sticks and a 8bitdo wireless adapter.On it’s own it is great if you like the games available. Only thing was the short wire on the controllers but the 8bitdo wireless adaptor fixes that. True blue also adding 100s of games was worth it.As long as your paying 40$ or less it is great.Launch price and limited games and short wires and dual shock controllers hurt the launch an reputation of it.But as I said true blue usb sticks and a 8bitdo wireless adaptor fixes this (still won’t be able to use the right DualShock unfortunately but that is because of the emulation software on the ps classic)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply amazing god bless! A must for the ages!
reviews.reviewText: Simply amazing a must during this pandemic. It includes the 20 classic games with 2 controllers an hdmi cable, and usb cable without power adapter, you can use a cube that you charge your phone with, download autobleem and get a flash drive if its 16 gb it must be FAT32 and call the drive SONY, transfer all the ps1 downloads to the games folder and plug it in the 2nd port and play crash bandicoot, spyro, toy story, and also retroarch will allow you to play Sega, Super Nintendo, Nintendo, all Gameboy systems. 💯

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great system--wish it came with more games!
reviews.reviewText: What an awesome little system! Thus far it works as expected--all of the games are operational. It is a little disappointinog that it only comes with 20 games and none of them are "Silent Hill" (missed opportunity, Sony). This does not come with an AC power adapter, but I just used the one that came with my phone--works wonderfully! All the cords fit into the system securely and it powers on and off properly. Al external buttons are operational. I bought this unit "new" from "Cotree" but the language was was not set to the default and there were saves on it from whomever owned it previously, so I suggest buying it from another seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is not a PlayStation Console
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was under the assumption that this was the original PlayStation console. This is not it. It literally fits in my hand and I cannot even play regular PlayStation games in it. I think it is way over priced and the games they loaded are not even the full games. This is definitely a rip off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good beginner Playstation
reviews.reviewText: This product is great for a child just learning how to play video games. The games are preloaded, and this makes it easy for the child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I feel a little catfished
reviews.reviewText: I came to Amazon to look for an original PlayStation but sadly almost anywhere I looked I found the "PlayStation classic ™", a console I'd never heard of prior to this experience. So I guess my biggest complaint is with the lack of attention it was given when it first released. Or perhaps the Lister of the product not saying in big bold letters "ONLY comes with these 20 games". The funny thing is though that the box is bigger than expected for a console of this size and heavier with the amount of protective boxes on the inside. So you wouldn't believe how baffled I was when I opened the box to find something so cute in place of an actual console. Some of the games been slightly changed since so much time has passed but they work perfectly. But, as I said earlier, you cannot add games to this 20-not-so-classic title lineup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic to the bone!
reviews.reviewText: I love this classic machine. My 10 year old self jumped getting to play the original version of Final Fantasy 7. I never got to beat it and now I have bragging rights. Sidenote, I wish they would’ve put Final Fantasy eight on this machine as well as crash bandicoot. Now those are PlayStation classic.
I LOVE this console. I bought it solely for the game FFVII. I have enjoyed playing on it for many hours. I will continue to enjoy it for many years to come.

Pequeño con respecto al original, funciona de maravilla, lo adquirí porque deseaba recordar el jugar "Resident Evil 1" tengo el original y funcionando a la perfección pero mí juego se dañó, pude haberlo comprado en la tienda de play pero sentí se pierde la sensación de jugarlo en su consola original, lo mejor no necesitas la tarjeta para guardar tu avance de juegos ya que lo hace en la misma consola, plus ... Trae preinstalado "Metal Gear Solid", "Syphon Filter 1" y más, en fin muy contento con la adquisición, tardo un día más en llegar a la fecha señalada pero al hacerlo lo hizo sin daño y muy bien empacado.

reviews.reviewTitle: Just what I wanted. Vintage vid.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted the classic games I played when I was younger and this delivers exactly that. Nice.

reviews.reviewTitle: La necesitaba para mi colección de consolas!!
reviews.reviewText: Muy buena consola, muy pequeña pero es mucho mejor ya con un hack y más juegos!!
The product doesn’t work. Where you are supposed to put the game in doesn’t open up. None of the controls lite up
